title: dEvI mInanEtrI
sahitya:
dEvI mInanEtrI brOva rAvE daya cEyavE brOvarAvammA


anupallavi

  sEvincavAri kellanu cintAmaNiyai yunnArA


caraNam 1    bAlA nIvE gatiyani ninnE cAlA nammina nApai parAkElA dayacEya nIkidi mElA divyAmbA 
kAlA divirANI sadguNa shIlA kIravANI dEvI nIla nIradavENI trilOka jananI dEvI mahEshvarI bhavAni
    caraNam 2    ambA mukha nirjita shata dhara bimbA rakSita dEvatAtavammA natanija suta guha hErambhAmbA 
   shyAmaLAmbA bimbAdharI gaurI kAdamba vihArI ambA kambu kaNThI himAshaila vrKSa pAlikA dEvI bAlAmbikA ambA
    caraNam 3    vANI ramA vandita rudrANI nI sATevaru kalyANI shyAmakrSNanutA kIravANI vINA vinOdini shrI
cakrakONE nivAsinI gIrvANa vandita padAravindA shivA dEvI kAtyAyanI ambA
